title: The Little Drummer Girl
creator_credit: George Roy Hill, Robert L. Crawford and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Diane Keaton stars as Charlie, an American actress and Palestinian sympathiser. Klaus Kinski is the head of an Israeli counterspy group who sees Charlie’s romantic vulnerability as the perfect trap for the elusive Palestinian terrorist Khalil. Based on the novel by John Le Carre.
